name: boilerplate-k6
description: This is a performance testing framework

scripts.perf: cd specs && k6 run getApi.js ; k6 run crudApi.js ; k6 run batchReq.js ; k6 run thresholdTest.js ; k6 run thresholdGroupDuration.js
scripts.cloud: cd specs && k6 cloud getApi.js ; k6 cloud crudApi.js ; k6 cloud batchReq.js ; k6 cloud thresholdTest.js ; k6 cloud thresholdGroupDuration.js

author: Subrato Sarkar
